title: Software Engineer
description: We're looking for a Software Engineer to join our team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining software applications, collaborating with cross-functional teams, and writing high-quality code.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
3+ years of experience in software development
Proficiency in one or more programming languages
Experience with web technologies and frameworks

title: Frontend Developer
description: Join our team as a Frontend Developer to create responsive and intuitive user interfaces. You'll work with designers and backend developers to implement engaging user experiences.
requirements: Strong knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Experience with React, Angular, or Vue
Understanding of responsive design principles
Knowledge of modern frontend build tools

title: Data Scientist
description: We are seeking a Data Scientist to analyze large datasets and develop predictive models. You will work with product teams to solve complex problems and drive data-informed decisions.
requirements: MS or PhD in Statistics, Computer Science, or related field
Experience with machine learning algorithms
Proficiency in Python or R
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills

title: iOS Developer
description: Join our team developing innovative iOS applications. You will be responsible for designing, implementing, and maintaining high-performance mobile applications.
requirements: Experience with Swift and iOS SDK
Understanding of iOS design principles
Knowledge of RESTful APIs
Familiarity with Git version control

title: Full Stack Engineer
description: We're looking for a Full Stack Engineer to join our team. You will work on both frontend and backend development, implement new features, and optimize application performance.
requirements: Experience with JavaScript/TypeScript
Knowledge of Node.js and React
Experience with database design and management
Understanding of server-side rendering
